profile.name: Kim Anh
profile.title: Android Developer
profile.description: I build reliable Android applications and explore modern mobile experiences.

about.title: About
about.paragraph1: I’m an Android Developer passionate about building reliable, user-focused mobile applications. I enjoy working on products that combine thoughtful design with focusing on performance, stability, and real-world usability.
about.paragraph2: Currently, I work at MOBILE-ID as an Android Developer, where I contribute to the development of Trusted Pay — a QR-based payment and transaction management solution for businesses. My work involves building core Android features, integrating APIs, handling real-time transaction updates, and ensuring smooth, stable app behavior in production environments.
about.paragraph3: Previously, I’ve had the opportunity to work on both mobile and web projects, collaborating closely with backend and product teams. Alongside Android development, I’ve also explored Zalo Mini App to build lightweight, modern interfaces for internal and customer-facing tools.

description: Researching and experimenting with ZMP / Zalo UI components to build responsive and user-friendly mini apps.
Testing UI patterns and integration with existing mobile services, ensuring consistency with design guidelines and best practices.
Integrated backend APIs to handle data retrieval and application workflows in Android applications.
Implemented Single Sign-On (SSO) authentication using Keycloak, following OAuth 2.0 / OpenID Connect flows.
Implemented push notifications using Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM) to receive and handle real-time notifications.
Developed Text-to-Speech (TTS) functionality to read notification content aloud.
Implemented QR code scanning features to extract and process citizen ID (CCCD) information.
Implemented internal web information interfaces using React.js and Tailwind CSS, strictly following Figma design guidelines.
Developed internal information and management pages for Trusted Pay, focusing on UI implementation and data display based on predefined designs.
Built web-based information interfaces for FacialSense, accurately translating Figma layouts into responsive web pages.

projects.title: Trusted Pay Mobile App
projects.description: Main Android application for Mobile-ID, handling citizen ID (CCCD), SSO login, push notifications, TTS, and QR scanning features.

projects.title: Trusted Pay Web
projects.description: Public web information interface for Trusted Pay, following Figma designs and displaying user/transaction data.

projects.title: FacialSense Web
projects.description: Public web information interface for FacialSense, translating Figma layouts into responsive web pages.

projects.title: Zalo Mini App Maps
projects.description: Navigation, route, and search location using ZMP SDK.
